doc:
Karolyn Grimes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karolyn_Grimes 0 Karolyn Grimes (born July 4, 1940) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Zuzu Bailey in the classic 1946 Frank Capra film It's a Wonderful Life. She also played Debbie in the 1947 film The Bishop's Wife. Karolyn_Grimes ( born July_4_,_1940 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for her_role as Zuzu_Bailey in the_classic_1946_Frank_Capra_film It 's a_Wonderful_Life . She also played Debbie in the_1947_film The_Bishop 's_Wife .
